name: Alien Zombie Invasion
description:
This is doomsday for planet Earth. Your Alien nation counts on you to conquer the blue planet.

Pilot your UFO through space junk.

It will be a long journey where you will have to avoid waves of meteors, soccer balls, hammers, teddy bears, laser gates, and many more.

Alien UFO Attack includes:

> 1 single usage secret weapon
> 50 levels of increasing difficulty
> 49 Achievements in the Game Center
